name: Moto Rally Racing VR
description:
This is an exciting racing type VR game that takes you in a real motorcycle competition. In the game, you will compete with many other racing drivers to feel the stimulation and passion in the virtual real world. By using the handle controller, you can fully control your motorcycle, including direction and speed.



The most important goal in the game is to reach the end at the fastest speed as much as possible. You need to be good at using the track situation to find the best driving route. Frequent brakes and impacts will affect your riding speed. At the same time, you also need to pay attention to the movement of other racers, use wisdom and skills to surpass them, and try to avoid collisions with them, maintain a stable speed to prevent rushing out of the track.
Are you ready? Put on the VR helmet, hold the handle, and welcome the speed challenge! In the game, only the most brave and flexible racer can win and become the real king of flying!



Operation method:
Throttle Left handle up / down
Turn Right handle left / right
Reset Position Right handle grip
Brake Left handle grip
Menu Handle menu key
